title: Tree Age Estimation
description: This program estimates the age of a tree based on the tree rings on its trunk. The input for this program is an image of the tree trunk, which will be processed using edge detection to count the number of rings detected.
partIMake: I worked on finding the center point and drawing a line from center to the edge to count the rings (tree rings) that were intersected.

title: Sleep Efficiency Regression
description: Sleep efficiency is defined as the ratio of the time spent in bed to the time actually spent sleeping. This model aims to predict individuals at risk of sleep disorders and improve overall sleep quality by providing recommendations on how to enhance their sleep efficiency.
partIMake: I worked on the preprocessing and modeling using random forest for this project.

programFlow.title: Data Statistic Analysis
programFlow.description: Modes, correlation, outliers, group data, range, frequency table

programFlow.title: Data Preparation
programFlow.description: Data Cleaning, Imputation, outlier handling, scling, feature selection

programFlow.title: Modelling, Tuning, and Evaluation
programFlow.description:
Model : Random Forest, Linear Regression, SVM 
 Tuning : GridSearchV

title: kucingkoding.com Website
description: This project involved creating a website to store assignments. The framework used for this project was Next.js and Tailwind CSS. Unfortunately, this project has not been continued.

programFlow.title: This website is a static landing page

title: Sirnoboyo Website
description: The Sirnoboyo Website is a village website developed as part of a community service program (KKN). It showcases the potential of Sirnoboyo Village, including local products and an interactive UMKM (Micro, Small, and Medium Enterprises) map. The website was built using WordPress.
partIMake: I was responsible for the complete development of the website, from design, frontend, and backend, to configuration setup to ensure easy updates and maintenance.

programFlow.title: Landing Page
programFlow.description: Contains information about the village, a preview of local potentials, the latest news highlights, general content, and a photo gallery.

programFlow.title: UMKM Page
programFlow.description: Displays a list of local businesses (UMKM). Clicking on an entry shows detailed information about the business and its products.

programFlow.title: UMKM Detail Page
programFlow.description: Shows detailed information about a specific UMKM along with its products.

programFlow.title: Culinary Tourism Page
programFlow.description: Features a collection of articles highlighting culinary tourism spots in Sirnoboyo Village.

programFlow.title: Maps Page
programFlow.description: Includes three types of maps, one of which is an interactive map developed by our KKN team using Leaflet.

programFlow.title: UMKM Distribution Map Page
programFlow.description: An example of an interactive map showcasing the distribution of UMKM, created with Leaflet.

programFlow.title: News Page
programFlow.description: Lists the latest news and updates from Sirnoboyo Village.

programFlow.title: Calendar Page
programFlow.description: Shows upcoming events in Sirnoboyo Village. This page was built using a plugin.

programFlow.title: Contact Page
programFlow.description: Provides contact information for further inquiries.
